description: Numbers that are not the sum of 3 distinct triangular numbers.
prog: (PARI) is(n)=for(c=ceil((sqrt(24*n-15)+3)/6),(sqrt(8*n-7)-1)/2,my(t=n-c*(c+1)/2);for(b=sqrtint(t-1)+1,min((sqrt(8*n+1)-1)/2,c-1), if(ispolygonal(t-b*(b+1)/2,3), return(0))));1select(is,[1..100]) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Nov 25 2014
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, _Dan Hoey_
